title: The Lost
description: 7 billion zombies. 1 little girl.When the zombie apocalypse claims America, only 1 in 10 million survive.Anna is one of them. She's 5 years old. She likes banana milkshakes and Alice in Wonderland. She's alone in a world full of danger that she cannot understand.Will she survive?'Alice in Wonderland' meets the zombie apocalypse like you've never seen it before, packed with gore, twists and the delightfully surreal.
author: Michael John Grist
